Detailed Description

This class implements a vector of three floats.

void Vector3::lerp ( const Vector3 &  v1,
const Vector3 &  v2,
float  alpha 
)

Porduces a linear interpolation of v1 an v2 based on alpha.

alpha = 0.0 result = v1 alpha = 0.5 result = (v1+v2)/2 alpha = 1.0 result = v2

Parameters:
v1 
v2 
alpha 

void Vector3::normalise (  ) 

This method normalises this vector.

That is, the direction of the vector will stay the same and its length will become 1.

void Vector3::setPitchYaw ( float  pitchInRadians,
float  yawInRadians 
)

This method sets this vector to the direction vector with the input pitch and yaw.

The vector will have unit length.
